cleaned_text: Welcome At Integrative Natural Health, we value and embrace the patient-centered approach. We attempt to find the root causes of the problem and provide individualized Naturopathic treatments to our patients. Naturopathic Medicine "A distinct primary health care profession, emphasizing prevention, treatment, and optimal health through the use of therapeutic methods and substances that encourage individuals' inherent self-healing process." Online Store Our formulas have been used and trusted by thousands of patients nationwide for over 20 years. We are diligent about finding the best raw materials, and our exacting standards of quality, purity, and efficacy. Like you, we want results. Schedule Your Appointment Today Are you ready to find out how we can help you optimize your health? Address & Contact Info David J. Richard, ND, LAc Stacey Meisel, ND Integrative Natural Health, Inc. 250
